alert.note: Alert for Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 12:03PM EST until January 04 at 12:15PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 1203 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dorchester, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Saint George, Dorchester, Harleyville and Canadys. This warning includes the following interstates: I-26 between mile markers 171 and 188. I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 61 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure, such as a basement or small interior room. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
